title: Enhancing Competencies in Online Language Program Management and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and elementary language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on smartphone-based mobile learning environments, with workplace-centric content for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three quality control standards for online language programs.
Learners can design a process to derive learner requirements by analyzing survey data.
Learners can propose at least two blended instruction strategies applicable in resource-constrained technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
